detailsData.title: Legal Expertise
detailsData.content: As an established trial attorney, Daphne has recovered millions of dollars for her clients. For the first time, a trial lawyer of this caliber is sharing all of her expertise to the public, without sending anyone an attorney bill.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Support
detailsData.content: The Academy provides all of Daphne’s secrets, provided through videos, checklists and handouts. It also provides step-by-step 'how to' scripts and tools so you can succeed as a woman in the workforce.

detailsData.title: Community Connection
detailsData.content: Connect with other powerful women who are educated advocates through community and support. The Academy offers regular group sessions with Daphne and continuous support through an online community.

detailsData.title: Affordable Access
detailsData.content: Much to the disdain of other lawyers who charge hourly for this information, Daphne decided to make everything available for an affordable price. The content is also easy-to-digest, woman-to-woman, and judgment-free.

subHeading: Confidently Advocate for Your Rights at Work
valueProp: Protect your paycheck, your time with your family, your health and your sanity! Learn how to advocate for your rights at work. The motherhood tax is real. The pay gap still exists. Too many women are forced out of jobs. It’s time to change that.

testimonalData.text: Thanks for all your info as you’ve so far saved our family! Thanks to your help I was able to keep my job and healthcare while tending to my kids.
testimonalData.author: April

testimonalData.text: I want to thank you deeply for all that you do! I was empowered and today I received the yes!!! I will be off for 12 extra paid weeks after pregnancy disability leave.
testimonalData.author: Adi

testimonalData.text: I’m a huge fan of yours! What you do is so appreciated and has already helped me a ton! You answered more of my questions about leave rights than my employer was able to!
testimonalData.author: KD
